wikipedia_page.main: Joseph Cartwright (29 December 1890 – 17 December 1949) was an English professional rugby league footballer who played in the 1910s and 1920s. He played at representative level for Great Britain, England and Lancashire, and at club level for Leigh (Heritage № 209), as a hooker, i.e. number 9, during the era of contested scrums.

response: * Joe Cartwright (rugby league), English rugby league player
* Little Joe Cartwright, the youngest Cartwright

response: Joseph or Joe Cartwright may refer to:
* Joe Cartwright (rugby league) (1890–1949), English rugby league footballer of the 1910s and 1920s
* Little Joe Cartwright, a character on the American TV series Bonanza
